results.title: Bull ant warriors
results.creator_credit: University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre and George Pashuk
results.brief_description: Study of the chemistry and behaviour of the Australian Red Bull Ant being undertaken by a research team in which a colony of ants is re-established in the laboratory under controlled conditions. Using close-up photography, dissection techniques and behavioural experiments research is undertaken in developing methods of control by other than chemical means. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.

results.title: Bulk buy beef
results.creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions and Meat and Livestock Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Meat makes the meal”.
This film clearly illustrates the variety of meat cuts available to the purchasers of bulk beef. The preparation of a side of beef from commercial cuts to domestic cuts to suit the preference of the purchaser is demonstrated. The advantages of home freezer use are emphasised.

results.title: Bulgaria: the land and the people
results.brief_description: Shows Bulgaria as a nation with a mixed heritage of Slavic, Greek, Turkish and Russian influences. There are still many reminders of these past civilisations. Under a communist government efforts have been made over the years to modernise industry and improve educational facilities and training.

results.title: Buildings and Bushfires-Improving the Chances of Survival
results.creator_credit: Television Production Unit and University of Melbourne
results.brief_description: Bushfires are an inevitable hazard in Australia. The tranquillity of the bush belies its potential to burn fiercely when conditions are suitable. This program shows how bushfires start fires in buildings, how embers, radiation and flame, aided by wind cause ignition and destruction of buildings; that embers are the most important means of ignition; that well-designed buildings have a very good chance of survival; and that such buildings will provide a safer place of refuge for people in bushfires.
results.title_for_label: Buildings and Bushfires-Improving the Chances of Survival

results.title: Building Victoria's 500KV System
results.brief_description: In 1964 when Victoria decided to build the 500KV System to bring power from the LaTrobe Valley to Melbourne, this was the first such system in Australia well before the building started, testing and planning was done.

results.title: Building typing skill
results.brief_description: Examines methods pf improving typing performance by improving attitude, typing form, muscle tone, and tying patters - all important factors in increasing typing speed.

results.title: Building trades
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the work of tradesmen in the construction of a house, an office block or a factory, including bricklayers, plasterers, tilers and carpenters. Discusses careers available to building tradesmen as supervisors or in their own building companies.

results.title: Building the industrial revolution
results.creator_credit: Link Film Services and Mick Gold
results.brief_description: A film about the elements that created the factory system, the buildings that housed it, and the social changes that it generated - a story told by the industrial architecture of the East Midlands, the area in which the first factories were built.
results.description: A film about the elements that created the factory system, the buildings that housed it, and the social changes that it generated - a story told by the industrial architecture of the East Midlands, the area in which the first factories were built.

results.title: Building synergy
results.creator_credit: R and R Productions and Ron V. Brown
results.brief_description: Outlines the co-operative action in Victoria between schools and the community for use of facilities such as halls, libraries and theatres. Schools designed with community use in mind are working very successfully, with co-ordination of facilities between school and community. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level.
